casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellee, v. Bartis, Appellant.

[Cite as State v. Bartis (1998), 84 Ohio St.3d 9.]

(Nos. 98-175 and 98-388 Submitted October 13, 1998 Decided November 25, 1998.) Ron O’Brien, Franklin County Prosecuting Attorney, and Steven L. Taylor, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellee. Judith M. Stevenson, Franklin County Public Defender, and John W. Keeling, Assistant Public Defender, for appellant.

*10The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of State v. Cook (1998), 83 Ohio St.3d 404, 700 N.E.2d 570.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
